summary: Jake has lived alone in the woods since the Vietnam War hiding from long buried memories. His gruff exterior and lonely routines are suddenly broken down by a young and feisty girl who works her way into his heart, changing him forever.
cast: Danny Glover|Ron Perlman|Linda Hamilton|Zoe Weizenbaum|David Strathairn|Timothy Webber|Gabrielle Rose|Frank C. Turner|Jesse Moss|Ty Olsson|Colin Lawrence|Isen Robbins
keywords: vietnam war veteran|living in exile|life changing decision|former platoon member|f rated
title: Missing in America
